languages.text: "Слышал, Глейто? Не часто тебя хвалят Вольные Торговцы. Голос!" {n}Кибермастиф издает громоподобный лай.{/n} "Будем считать, что Глейто выразил свое почтение и извинился".

"Did you hear that, Glaito? It's not often you receive praise from a Rogue Trader. Speak!" {n}The cyber-mastiff lets out a thunderous bark.{/n} "Let's say Glaito has expressed his respect and apologised."
languages.original_text: "Слышал, Глейто? Не часто тебя хвалят Вольные Торговцы. Голос!" {n}Кибермастиф издает громоподобный лай.{/n} "Будем считать, что Глейто выразил свое почтение и извинился".

traits.locale_text: "Did you hear that, Glaito? It's not often you receive praise from a Rogue Trader. Alert!" {n}The cyber-mastiff lets out a thunderous bark.{/n} "Let's say Glaito has expressed his respect and apologised."

"Did you hear that, Glaito? It's not often you receive praise from a Rogue Trader. Alert!" {n}The cyber-mastiff lets out a thunderous bark.{/n} "Let's say Glaito has expressed his respect and apologised."

"Did you hear that, Glaito? It's not often you receive praise from a Rogue Trader. Speak!" {n}The cyber-mastiff lets out a thunderous bark.{/n} "Let's say Glaito has expressed his respect and apologised."

"Did you hear that, Glaito? It's not often you receive praise from a Rogue Trader. Speak!" {n}The cyber-mastiff lets out a thunderous bark.{/n} "Let's say Glaito has expressed his respect and apologised."

languages.text: 「聞いたか、グライト？ローグトレーダーから称賛されるなんて、そうあることじゃないぞ。吠えろ！」{n}サイバーマスチフは雷鳴のような声で吠えた。{/n}「グライトは敬意を示し、謝罪の意を表したということにしておいてください」
languages.original_text: "Did you hear that, Glaito? It's not often you receive praise from a Rogue Trader. Speak!" {n}The cyber-mastiff lets out a thunderous bark.{/n} "Let's say Glaito has expressed his respect and apologised."

traits.locale_text: 「聞いたか、グライト？ローグトレーダーから称賛されるなんて、そうあることじゃないぞ。吠えろ！」{n}サイバーマスチフは雷鳴のような声で吠えた。{/n}「グライトは敬意を示し、謝罪の意を表したということにしておいてください」

languages.text: "Hast du gehört, Glaito? Von {mf|einem Freihändler|einer Freihändlerin} wird man nicht oft gelobt. Sag was!" {n}Der Cyber-Mastiff lässt ein donnerndes Bellen hören.{/n} "Ich würde sagen, Glaito hat seinen Respekt bekundet und sich entschuldigt."
languages.original_text: "Did you hear that, Glaito? It's not often you receive praise from a Rogue Trader. Speak!" {n}The cyber-mastiff lets out a thunderous bark.{/n} "Let's say Glaito has expressed his respect and apologised."

traits.locale_text: "Hast du gehört, Glaito? Von {mf|einem Freihändler|einer Freihändlerin} wird man nicht oft gelobt. Sag was!" {n}Der Cyber-Mastiff lässt ein donnerndes Bellen hören.{/n} "Ich würde sagen, Glaito hat seinen Respekt bekundet und sich entschuldigt."

languages.text: « Tu entends, Glaito ? Ce n'est pas souvent que l'on reçoit un compliment de la part d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}. Parle ! » {n}Le cyber-mastiff pousse un aboiement sonore.{/n} « Disons que Glaito a ainsi exprimé son respect et présenté ses excuses. »
languages.original_text: "Did you hear that, Glaito? It's not often you receive praise from a Rogue Trader. Speak!" {n}The cyber-mastiff lets out a thunderous bark.{/n} "Let's say Glaito has expressed his respect and apologised."

traits.locale_text: « Tu entends, Glaito ? Ce n'est pas souvent que l'on reçoit un compliment de la part d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}. Parle ! » {n}Le cyber-mastiff pousse un aboiement sonore.{/n} « Disons que Glaito a ainsi exprimé son respect et présenté ses excuses. »

languages.text: «¿Has oído, Glaito? No es habitual recibir los elogios de un Comerciante Independiente. ¡Di algo!». {n}El cibermastín profiere un estruendoso ladrido.{/n} «Digamos que Glaito ha expresado su respeto y le ha pedido disculpas».
languages.original_text: "Did you hear that, Glaito? It's not often you receive praise from a Rogue Trader. Speak!" {n}The cyber-mastiff lets out a thunderous bark.{/n} "Let's say Glaito has expressed his respect and apologised."

traits.locale_text: «¿Has oído, Glaito? No es habitual recibir los elogios de un Comerciante Independiente. ¡Di algo!». {n}El cibermastín profiere un estruendoso ladrido.{/n} «Digamos que Glaito ha expresado su respeto y le ha pedido disculpas».

languages.text: “听到了吗，格雷托？不是每只生化獒犬都能得到行商浪人亲口赞扬，快答话！”{n}格雷托随即发出了雷鸣般的吠叫。{/n}“这么说吧，格雷托已经表达了敬意，也向你道歉了。”
languages.original_text: "Did you hear that, Glaito? It's not often you receive praise from a Rogue Trader. Speak!" {n}The cyber-mastiff lets out a thunderous bark.{/n} "Let's say Glaito has expressed his respect and apologised."

traits.locale_text: “听到了吗，格雷托？不是每只生化獒犬都能得到行商浪人亲口赞扬，快答话！”{n}格雷托随即发出了雷鸣般的吠叫。{/n}“这么说吧，格雷托已经表达了敬意，也向你道歉了。”

languages.text: "Duydun mu Glaito? Bir Hür Tacir'den kırk yılda bir ancak övgü alırsın. Konuş!" {n}Siber mastif, gürültülü bir şekilde havlıyor.{/n} "Glaito'nun saygısını dile getirip özür dilediğini varsayalım."
languages.original_text: "Did you hear that, Glaito? It's not often you receive praise from a Rogue Trader. Speak!" {n}The cyber-mastiff lets out a thunderous bark.{/n} "Let's say Glaito has expressed his respect and apologised."

traits.locale_text: "Duydun mu Glaito? Bir Hür Tacir'den kırk yılda bir ancak övgü alırsın. Konuş!" {n}Siber mastif gürültülü bir şekilde havlar.{/n} "Glaito'nun saygısını dile getirip özür dilediğini varsayalım."

languages.original_text: "Did you hear that, Glaito? It's not often you receive praise from a Rogue Trader. Speak!" {n}The cyber-mastiff lets out a thunderous bark.{/n} "Let's say Glaito has expressed his respect and apologised."
